objects.name: TutorialText1
objects.string:
Several Frederick Douglass figurines and historical exhibits were on their way to be displayed at UMD, but due an unfortunate accident in delivery, the figurines have been strewn around campus, and some of the exhibits have been put into disarray.

You've been sent in to gather all the missing figurines and help put the exhibits back in order!

content.text:
Several Frederick Douglass figurines and historical exhibits were on their way to be displayed at UMD, but due an unfortunate accident in delivery, the figurines have been strewn around campus, and some of the exhibits have been put into disarray.

You've been sent in to gather all the missing figurines and help put the exhibits back in order!

objects.name: TutorialText2
objects.string:
Navigate the various locations by clicking or tapping on the red arrows.

The Magnifying Glass symbols let you inspect different objects in the environment. Click or tap on them to get a closer look at something.

Items you find will be stored in your backpack. If you need to see an item's description again, select the item and then tap the magnifying glass inside the inventory.

content.text:
Navigate the various locations by clicking or tapping on the red arrows.

The Magnifying Glass symbols let you inspect different objects in the environment. Click or tap on them to get a closer look at something.

Items you find will be stored in your backpack. If you need to see an item's description again, select the item and then tap the magnifying glass inside the inventory.

objects.name: TutorialText3
objects.string:
Question Mark symbols can be selected to learn more about an object or location's historical significance.

You can use the map to travel to previously visited areas.

Clicking or tapping on the eye will highlight interactable objects (enabled by default on touchscreen devices).

content.text:
Question Mark symbols can be selected to learn more about an object or location's historical significance.

You can use the map to travel to previously visited areas.

Clicking or tapping on the eye will highlight interactable objects (enabled by default on touchscreen devices).

objects.name: TutorialText4
objects.string:
The Figurine Icon will be outlined if there are still figurines left to collect in the current area. Make sure to keep an eye out, and try interacting with whatever you can.


Collect all the Frederick Douglass figurines to win!

content.text:
The Figurine Icon will be outlined if there are still figurines left to collect in the current area. Make sure to keep an eye out, and try interacting with whatever you can.
